tool_description: Ayfie Document Converter is an online document converter that supports 550+ file formats (such as PDF, XLSX, DOCX, TIF or TXT). You can drag and drop your files directly in the portal here or using the API to have the converter integrated in your app.
name: Converter
title: Converter

api_list.name: /api/converter/1/FileConverter/Convert

utterances.utterance: Convert this PDF file to a Word document.
Can you change this Excel spreadsheet into a PDF?
Transform this Word document into a TXT file.
Please convert this TIF image to a PNG format.
I need this DOCX file converted to a PDF.
Convert this TXT file to a DOCX format.
Change this XLSX file to a CSV format.
Can you convert this PDF to a JPEG image?
Transform this PowerPoint presentation into a PDF.
Convert this Word document to an HTML file.
